title: Club tags still not showing
body: Patch notes say they're back, but when I'm in game the club tag does not show beside my name. It does show in loading screen but that was always there. Any way to solve this?

replies.body: Which club tag wasn't showing correctly if you don't mind? Looks like you're in a few and one of them doesn't actually have a tag setup. Also, be sure you've enabled show club tags in your profile.
My 6IX MANS Club. With the tag 6ix! is not showing in game.
